name: City Museum
description: Explore the history and culture of the city through exhibits and events.

name: Central Park
description: A large urban park perfect for picnics, walks, and outdoor activities.

name: Historic Theater
description: Enjoy live performances, plays, and concerts in a historic setting.

name: Science Center
description: Interactive science exhibits for all ages.

name: Local Market
description: Fresh produce, artisan goods, and a taste of local culture.

name: Botanical Garden
description: Beautiful gardens showcasing native and exotic plants.

name: Riverwalk
description: Scenic walking paths along the river, cafes, and shops.
